Class TheaterSales

  • java.lang.Object
    • TheaterSales

  • public class TheaterSales
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the quantities for items sold in a theater and calculates the sales of each item based on quantities sold Date: 10/7/13
    Author:
    Adam Holt
